forbidden: Access to the requested resource is forbidden.
validation_error: Validation error. Please check your input.
server_error: Internal server error. Please try again later.
duplicate_entry: Duplicate entry. The record already exists.
bad_request: Bad request. Please provide valid data.
invalid_credentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your username and password.
file_upload_error: Error uploading the file. Please try again.
authentication_failed: Authentication failed. Unable to verify your identity.
timeout_error: Request timeout. Please try again later.
unavailable_service: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
invalid_operation: Invalid operation. The requested action is not allowed.
insufficient_permissions: Insufficient permissions to perform the requested operation.
